entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:09 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 01:28 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
